[[inst_ld_xor]]
==== LD.XOR

*Syntax:* ld.xor<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Xor operation: memory value is atomically xored with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_xor.svg[LD.XOR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
